alt: John Lu shares about a group of hackers discovered attacking systems in Vietnam. Photo: Luu Quy
article_heading: Many hacker groups are targeting systems in Vietnam.
description: The image depicts a presentation slide with a speaker standing in front of it. The slide is titled "GuDiAo attacked media entities in Vietnam" and includes bullet points detailing the timeline, victims, malware, and the lightdm exploit used in the attack. The slide also includes a diagram of a lightdm exploit, which is a Linux version of the SharpM exploit. The speaker appears to be addressing an audience, possibly at a conference or seminar, given the presence of other attendees in the background. The setting suggests a formal or professional event, as indicated by the attire of the speaker and the audience.
